body:
Thanks for all!

I really enjoyed Avicus, and the users were like my family.
Now im banned, but i want to say that Avicus has great mods.
I will miss this server too much ):
I love you!
From México, Arturo Avila "The_Eolos".

P.D. I sent an appeal mail to the mods :) so please check it.

I'm thinking about suicide, so if you watch this, please type in my coffin "Banned from Avicus, but no banned from the paradise."
body_tagged:

title: I will miss you guys! Good bye.

replies.body:
gawd u make a thread each 10 minutes about ur ban, just stop...
also BTW dont say ur gonna suicide, everyone who is banned say that, its just ridiculous
replies.body_tagged:
gawd u make a thread each 10 minutes about ur ban, just stop...
also BTW dont say ur gonna suicide, everyone who is banned say that, its just ridiculous

replies.body: Ain't our fault u didn't listen to those kicks. I see repeats on your infraction page on "caps" and "language" as well as "hackusations"
replies.body_tagged: Ain't our fault u didn't listen to those kicks. I see repeats on your infraction page on "caps" and "language" as well as "hackusations"

replies.body: You don't have to make a post about your ban every 20 minutes or so. Plus, you don't need to suicide at all. Suicide is never the answer. Especially if you got banned from a MineCraft server. Goodbye.
replies.body_tagged: You don't have to make a post about your ban every 20 minutes or so. Plus, you don't need to suicide at all. Suicide is never the answer. Especially if you got banned from a MineCraft server. Goodbye.

replies.body:
I'm thinking about suicide, 
I hope you're joking. If you kill yourself over a minecraft server, you shouldn't even be gaming in the first place.
replies.body_tagged:
I'm thinking about suicide, 
I hope you're joking. If you kill yourself over a minecraft server, you shouldn't even be gaming in the first place.

replies.body: I think you or a mod should archive this. Talking about committing suicide over a minecraft server? This really shouldn't be here..
replies.body_tagged: I think you or a mod should archive this. Talking about committing suicide over a minecraft server? This really shouldn't be here..

replies.body: If youre joking about the suicidd thing, dont bother asking to be unbanned. Suicide is nothing to joke about.
replies.body_tagged: If youre joking about the suicidd thing, dont bother asking to be unbanned. Suicide is nothing to joke about.
